thread.title: Search Technologies Honored as one of Americas Fastest-Growing Private Companies by Inc. Magazine
thread.title_full: Search Technologies Honored as one of Americas Fastest-Growing Private Companies by Inc. Magazine - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Search Technologies Honored as one of Americas Fastest-Growing Private Companies by Inc. Magazine
text:
Search Technologies makes the 2015 Inc. 500/5000 list for 6th consecutive year
Herndon, Virginia
Search Technologies, the leading IT services firm specializing in enterprise search and big data applications , announced today that the company is included in Inc. Magazine’s prestigious Inc. 500|5000 list of America’s Fastest-Growing Private Companies.
Companies such as Microsoft, Oracle, Intuit, and many other well-known names gained early exposure as members of the Inc. 500|5000. This marks the 6th consecutive year that Search Technologies has been included in the exclusive ranking.
“We are honored to be included in the Inc. 500|5000 list for the 6th year in a row, and to be nationally recognized for our achievements,” said Kamran Khan, CEO of Search Technologies. “Since our inception 10 years ago, Search Technologies has been growing profitably each year with 85% growth in the last three years alone. We are successful because of our deep expertise in search and analytics, which translates well into opportunities in big data. We are also focused – on hiring the best and brightest people, and on providing independent, vendor agnostic, and innovative solutions with the best interest of our customers in mind.” Khan added.
Complete results of the Inc. 5000, including company profiles and an interactive database that can be sorted by industry, region, and other criteria, can be found at http://www.inc.com/inc5000 . Search Technologies’ profile can be found at http://www.inc.com/profile/search-technologies . For more information on Search Technologies’ search and big data services and solutions, or to learn about career opportunities visit http://www.searchtechnologies.com .
About Search Technologies
Search Technologies is the leading trusted and independent technology services firm specializing in the design, implementation, and management of enterprise search and big data analytics applications. We have delivered results for over 600 customers across all commercial and government sectors. Our experienced consultants and unique technical assets help us deliver customized search and analytics applications that are easier to use, less expensive, more powerful, and most of all, more reliable.
